attributes.action: Change vehicle tax (VED) to operate on a 'date to date' basis.
attributes.additional_details:
The 'month to month' basis was necessary when tax discs were printed for display but since the withdrawal of the paper disc, and the adoption of a computerised system there is now no need to align to the start/finish of a month.
This would also correct an issue caused by the non- transferable VED rule that was brought in when selling a used vehicle. 
Currently it's possible (and often happens) that the seller & buyer both pay for 1 month of VED due to the overlap.
attributes.background: Change vehicle tax (VED) to operate on a 'date to date' basis rather than the 'month to month' basis that is currently in place.
